application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a single storey roof extension to facilitate conversion of 1x bed unit into 2 x bed unit; formation of a roof terrace; elevational alterations.
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed east facing living room window at first floor level shall be fitted with obscured glazing and the extent that it may be opened shall be limited to that necessary to allow natural ventilation, and the window shall be permanently maintained as such.</p><p>Reason: To ensure that the proposed window does not allow the overlooking of neighbouring premises thereby leading to a loss of visual privacy.</p><p><br></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

Full details, including manufacturerâ€™s specification and details and photos, of all the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, including, but not limited to the bricks, roofing, coping materials, rooflights and rainwater goods, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work commences on site. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.REASON: To protect the character and appearance of the Conservation Area and to ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest of the area under Section 72 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and the significance of the Non Designated Heritage Asset under NPPF Para 197.

Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of one Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity. REASON: In the interests of biodiversity.
